Reviews.Title: Good product, good service.
Reviews.Author: Martin
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Blackberry mainly for the color, as my wife wanted a red phone. The use of the Blackberry is mainly international (outside of the US) and it works perfectly in all the countries I used it. Great deal for an unlocked brand new phone.

Reviews.Title: NICE PHONE!
Reviews.Author: ANA ALEJANDRA TORRES HERRERA
Reviews.Content: I'M VERY PLEASED WITH MY PHONE! IT'S TOTALLY NEW AND IT HAS ALL THE ACCESSORIES!! THE ONLY SMALL PROBLEM WAS IT HASN'T THE INVOICE WHEN IT WAS RECEIVED BY MY COURIER CAUSING DELAY IN THE CUSTOMS HOUSE FOR THE CALCULATION OF TAX, BUT IN ALL THE LINES I FEEL HAPPY WITH THE PRODUCT!

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Wolfsbain76
Reviews.Content: I'm always skeptical about buying products online. To my surprise, when I received the BlackBerry it was as the seller stated. It was a New cell phone and packaged just like out of the factory line! I was worried though since I had read that it does not have Spanish language capability. Fortunately, it gave an option on what language I wanted it in on start-up and Spanish was one of the options (Since this phone is a gift for someone in the Dominican Republic). It's working just as it was built to do and works brilliantly in the Dominican Republic. Overall, I'm satisfied with this product and the packaging and the seller.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: Arrived literally the next day I ordered it. It works fine and does all that I need it to do. Really easy to use, I am a new time Blackberry user and didn't find it hard at all to adapt to it.

Reviews.Title: Charger for US outlets only
Reviews.Author: Suzanne
Reviews.Content: Just received the phone, and there is no converter included for non-U.S. outlets, though it is pictured in the product information. Nor is there a packing list, either online or with the product. And (ironically) there seems to be no way to make a phone call to inquire, so let the buyer beware. If you are buying this for use abroad, get yourself a converter.

Reviews.Title: Bad quality phone, complicated to use
Reviews.Author: Mauricio
Reviews.Content: Tha worst buy i had did its get this Blackberry phone, the first day i had used had working good, then i had log off , the next day i had use again and i was surprissed  this phone dont accepted the sim card , i dont know what happen. I had really dissapointed with this phone.I dont recommend buy this phone.

Reviews.Title: As Advertised...almost
Reviews.Author: geneoman
Reviews.Content: Product is as described with the exception of the UK and European adapters, which were not included.  I noticed others made the same comment so the pictures should be updated to reflect the actual contents.  Otherwise product is new and performs as advertised.  I have installed an International SIM card (which is suprisingly expensive for the people calling and texting me) and will be using the phome in Germany and the Middle East later this month.

Reviews.Title: It's ok, but not as good as expected
Reviews.Author: Berlee
Reviews.Content: I have been a BB user for at least 5 years and have often owned the latest models mostly for business use. I purchased this one as a personal BB. Unfortunately, automatically I could tell it was not of the same quality as the others. It was much lighter and just felt flimsier. It also took a while to figure out how to download BB messenger which came pre-loaded in my past BBs. Perhaps that is standard, but it just seemed a bit odd to me that BB did not include BB messenger pre-loaded in its own devices...

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Kjb Pr
Reviews.Content: this is my firts blackberry and i love it soo much the color is great it fit perfect in your  hands

Reviews.Title: BB 85200
Reviews.Author: JT
Reviews.Content: It arrived in perfect condition and brand new.  I use an ATT account with it and my business apps have  no problem. I would recommend to get if compatible with your mobile carrier.

Reviews.Title: Very reasonable replacement.
Reviews.Author: Donald C. Bennett
Reviews.Content: Purchased to replace an aging white 8520, this phone has proven equal to the task. It is hampered, although not as much, by the rapidly declining T-Mobile service in my area. Once my T-Mobile contract is over, I plan to use it exclusively as an international phone when I travel and am considering using Virgin's I-Phone (Sprint service is more reliable here) domestically if Blackberry's demise appears more imminent.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Leidyangel
Reviews.Content: Todo llegue en perfectas condiciones lo que pedi. Producto de excelente calidad. sin nada mas que decirGracias, se recomienda..saludos de Venezuela..

Reviews.Title: bb
Reviews.Author: jo.lorqt
Reviews.Content: my bb is coming tmrrow i so happy right now :) do it come with a sd card? cause it would be great for me they stole my phone on monday with my sd card 2GB :(

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone, Beautiful Color
Reviews.Author: Maribel
Reviews.Content: I received the phone on time, new and in a good condition. The phone works great and has a beautiful color, just I hoped. It came unlocked and works very well with telephone operators of Venezuela. A good phone for a good price. I love it.

Reviews.Title: BUENO BUENO
Reviews.Author: YONARDO MORENO
Reviews.Content: GRACIAS POR SU VENTA ESTE ARTICULO ES MUY BUENO ES DE BUENA CALIDAD NOS SENTIMOS RESPTADOS Y AFORTUNADOS POR HACER NEGOCIOS SERIOS CON USTEDES DEMUESTRAN CONFIANZA PARA PROXIMAS COMPRAS. GRACIAS

Reviews.Title: Excelente Teléfono
Reviews.Author: Mauricio Malo "Cinefilo"
Reviews.Content: Se lo compré a mi hermana y ella está muy feliz con el equipo. Es liviano, tiene un estilo bastante agradable y es muy fácil de usar. El único problema que encontré es que a veces parece tener dificultad para conectarse a una red de internet wireless.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Mohamed A. Baaqil
Reviews.Content: The phone is cool, small and easy to be used. The trackpad make it easier to use the phone. Better than the trackball.

Reviews.Title: Trackpad Stop Working
Reviews.Author: Daniela Torres
Reviews.Content: I had this device for less than a year and the phone worked well for 6 months after that It hangs everytime so I have to reboot it. In addition to that, 2 months ago the Trackpad stoped working, I looked for the suposed "INTERNATIONAL WARRANTY PAPER" and I realize that it didn't came inside the box. The phone it's useless now. How do I claim the warranty outside the US?

Reviews.Title: Información de Producto
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: Este producto, es bello, el color es hermoso, es muy elegante. y tiene muchas funciones,y la tienda es muy responsable, ya que el producto me llego antes de la fecha indicada.recomiendo tanto el producto como la tienda ampliamente.

Reviews.Title: Good basic phone.
Reviews.Author: Kendra Jithoo
Reviews.Content: Very reliable.  Good easy phone to use.  Not full of technology but served it's purpose.  This phone was stolen, but workd great for the time I had it.

Reviews.Title: Excelente producto
Reviews.Author: Anabell Claret Amoldoni Miquilena
Reviews.Content: Buen producto, gracias.  Recomiendo con toda honestidad. No tengo nada malo que decir sobre este celular Gracias de nuevo. aun lo tengo

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: TP
Reviews.Content: I messed up my new Blackberry and refused to pay the full price to get another.  My daughter insisted I have a replacement, since I love Blackberry phones.  This phone works great.  Only thing I have not figured out is how to get the WiFi to boost my signal inside my home.

Reviews.Title: New product received in good condition. Just what my son wanted and at a good price too.
Reviews.Author: Marva Walwyn-Gill
Reviews.Content: New product received in good condition. Just what my son wanted and at a good price too. He loves the color cause red is his favorite color - bought the Gameboy case to go with it. He loves the the phone and it works well

Reviews.Title: BLACKBERRY 8520
Reviews.Author: DES
Reviews.Content: I AM SO DISSAPOINTED IN THIS PRODUCT.THIS PHONE REFUSED TO WORK IN DECEMBER THIS YEAR.I AM CRUSHED.I WISH I COULD GET A REFUND.I WILL NEVER BUY ANYTHING ELECTRONIC ONLINE.I LIVE IN TRINIDAD,WEST INDIES

Reviews.Title: Problems
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: Hi,unfortunately the CHARGER for my fone came with the wrong plug to connect to the blackberry end, it would not fit, the plug end was larger! Also, the CD that came with the package was with 2 huge scratchs! Those things are totally unnacceptable! In addition, I asked for a red phone, but i have got a WHITE one! So frustrating...

Reviews.Title: Nice Cost Efficient Model
Reviews.Author: OrEg0n
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice and cost efficient entry level BlackBerry, you can chose from different colors and you get pretty much everything that you would get in the higher end models, with the exception of GPS and accessories that do not come in the box.

Reviews.Title: solucion
Reviews.Author: roxiris brea
Reviews.Content: compre mi producto nuevo y me llego dañado no tiene señal con ninguna de las casas telefonicas de venezuela en todos lados me dicen que es el amplificador de señal y el producto es (nuevo)

Reviews.Title: My purchase does not come still
Reviews.Author: Soledad
Reviews.Content: Help me please that the purchase should realize it the first days of June and it has not come to his destination

ProductInfo.Features:
2.0MP Digital Camera, High-resolution display with 320 x 240 65.000 colors; TFT LCD and 2.46 inches display, Bluetooth
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint
Unlocked Quad Band: GSM 850/900/1800/1900 and GPRS capabilities
Video format support: MPEG4, H.263, H.264, WMV3, Audio format support: AAC-LC, AAC+, eAAC+, AMR-NB, WMA9
Talk time up to 5 hours - Standby up to 17 days
2.0 MP camera, 5X digital zoom, Video Camera Recording:Normal Mode (320x240 pixel),MMS Mode (176x144 pixel)
2.0MP Digital Camera, High-resolution display with 320 x 240 65.000 colors TFT and 2.46 inches, Bluetooth
35 key backlit QWERTY keyboard with touch-sensitive optical trackpad
It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint
Quad-Band: 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900MHz GSM/GPRS/EDGE networks
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
Up to 4.5 hours of talk time, up to 408 hours (17 days) of standby time
Wi-Fi enabled
ProductInfo.Name: BlackBerry 8520OEMRED Gemini 8520 Unlocked Phone with 2 MP Camera, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi--International Version (Red)
